com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface CategoryService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentService<Category,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Category,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryServiceImpl

    public interface CategoryService
extends ContentService<Category,java.lang.Long>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Category class.
    See Also:
    Category, ContentService, DataService

        Initializes, saves and returns a new category.
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new category.
        description - a description of the new category.
        keywords - a keywords of the new category.
        photoFile - a photo of the new category.
        section - a section of the new category.
        isValid - validated of the new category.
        Returns:
        The new saving category.

                       java.lang.String photoAction,
                       Section section,
                       boolean isValid)
        Initializes, updates and returns category with parameter url.
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the category to update.
        title - a new title to the category.
        description - a new description to the category.
        keywords - a new keywords to the category.
        photoFile - a new photo to the category.
        photoAction - a action on the main photo.
        section - a new section to the category.
        isValid - a validated of the category.
        Returns:
        The updating category with parameter id.
        See Also:
        Category, Section, Photo
